Marriage is a contract, in the form in w:
(if (MarriageContract x) (Concept x))
(if (StateView x) (Concept x))
(if (AcquiredRights x) (Concept x))
(if (ConditionalAcquisition x) (Concept x))
(if (StateLaw x) (Concept x))

(MarriageContract mc)
(StateView sv)
(AcquiredRights ar)
(ConditionalAcquisition ca)
(StateLaw sl)

(if (view sv mc) (acquire ar ca))
(if (subject ca sl) (acquire ar ca))
